author: Unreal Engine
description:
Join Luis Placid and Shazzy Gustafson of ICVR for an in-depth look at how publicly available AI tools can drastically accelerate 3D content creation for Unreal Engine—and explore areas where it still falls short.

This case study shows how a handcrafted Unreal Engine scene was recreated from the ground up using AI tools and workflows. The session highlights the most effective generative AI use cases, as well as the areas where AI struggled to match the original handcrafted quality benchmark, including 2D-to-3D character generation, environment creation with neural splats, automated character rigging, and AI-driven animation. 

Whether you're an artist, developer, technical director, or creative, this talk aims to demystify AI workflows in Unreal Engine, highlight various challenges and solutions, and show where and how you can begin leveraging these tools today to unlock new creative possibilities for you and your team.

Topics include the best publicly available AI tools for UE produ
title: AI in Action: Transforming UE Workflows with AI Tools | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Teravision Games has a story to tell—with their game studio on the verge of closing, they immersed themselves in UEFN development and won the day.

In this session, Luis Daniel Zambrano of Teravision Games talks about the process that led the studio to create the Havoc Hotel island and games. Emphasis on UEFN's rapid iteration capabilities enabled the team to leverage their 18 years of development experience to create and self-publish successful games in Fortnite. 

Find out how Teravision increased their games' chances of success by focusing on player engagement, retention, and a fun set of mechanics; hear about their entrepreneurial approach to game development in Fortnite; and learn what they think about UEFN as game development platform.
title: TeraCreators: How UEFN Saved Our GameDev Studio | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
